body_html:
We're working on a plan for translation infrastructure. It's something we know we need to do. I'm closing this since we don't need a bug per language.

@ewilderj do you know of any community translation efforts in the mean time?

body:
We're working on a plan for translation infrastructure. It's something we know we need to do. I'm closing this since we don't need a bug per language.  

@ewilderj do you know of any community translation efforts in the mean time?
